DOC.detailed_description: In study , 80 case surgical otolaryngology child undergo elective surgery divide four groupsï¼šoral administration group , intramuscular group , rectal infusion group , intranasal group depend route administration anesthesia . By observe difference sedative effect , postoperative recovery , postoperative psychological behavior among four group , compare effect four pre-anesthetic administration route .
DOC.criteria: Informed consent child 's parent ; Children patient pediatric surgery E.N.T . department ; surgery time 1 ~ 3 hour ; Aged 1 7 year old ; American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) classification : class I~II ; With cardiovascular respiratory complication ; A history endocrine system ; A long history application sedative drug ; Water electrolyte balance disorder preoperatively ; Liver kidney dysfunction ; Nervous system dysfunction ; High gastrointestinal obstruction ; Tracheoesophageal fistula , trachea foreign body , hiatal hernia , dysphagia ; Lung infection , atelectasis ; Congenital heart disease ( CHD ) ; Severe malnutrition ; Traumatic ischemia anoxic encephalopathy , high cranial pressure ; Anesthesia surgery conduct 3 day ;
